title: Does Amity university offer any semester abroad programs or international transfer programs for it's students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Amity does offer a semester abroad program where they send you off to dubai/singapore/london depending on your course and feasibility. They would send you off abroad for about 45 days near the end of semester and your assessment would be based on what you did abroad instead of  an end-semester exam. You can opt for this in more than one semester. Another program amity has to offer is a 3continent program where the last semester of your course will be spent in all the three countries.  This will cost about double of the normal program. Hope this answers your query.

Yes, Amity University does offer Semester Abroad programs (SAP) for the students. SAP is important for global exposure to students of various disciplines. The features of SAP are: Industry VisitsExtensive Project ReportsExcellent exposure, cross-cultural orientation &sensitization on the foreign economies, societies, do’s and don’ts, etc.Special modules delivered by the Industry experts and Leading foreign facultyFamiliarization with industry dynamics and trends on a global scale

Yes Amity does send its students for international transfer and international semester programmes, which are conducted in Amity campus of that particular country in association with local university of that Country.

Amity University's semester abroad program is absolutely worth it. Having spoken to students who've been a part of this program I can assuredly say that they not only experienced diversity in culture but the diversity in study patterns. The concept of professional life was very well encountered by the students. 3 continents, ASIA, NORTH AMERICA, and EUROPE, are three major continents of the world, you don't just get to spend an entire semester in any of these continents you also get to have a bite of their lifestyle and working worlds. You get to gauge the sort of competition the world's working on. And the way I see it, that's what matters the most.
Yes it is called sap. If you visit the amity university website then you will find that for any one semester you can go abroad for sap( study abroad program).
Yes Amity offers study abroad programs and international transfers to it students
